wikipedia_page.main: Major General Barrington Bulkeley Campbell, 3rd Baron Blythswood,  (18 February 1845 – 13 March 1918) was a British Army officer.

response: Archibald Campbell, 4th Baron Blythswood KCVO (25 April 1870–14 November 1929) was the son of Barrington Campbell, 3rd Baron Blythswood, and grandson of Archibald Douglas of Mains.
*Barrington Campbell, 3rd Baron Blythswood (1845–1918), British Army major general
